thread.title: BRIEF-First Credit Finance Group Expects To‍ Record An Increase In Consolidated Profit Attributable For FY

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-First Credit Finance Group Expects To‍ Record An Increase In Consolidated Profit Attributable For FY

organizations.name: brief-first credit finance group expects to‍ record an increase in consolidated

text:
March 9 (Reuters) - First Credit Finance Group Ltd :
* EXPECTS TO ‍ RECORD AN INCREASE IN CONSOLIDATED PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE OF ABOUT 58% FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO ‍GAIN OF DISPOSAL OF A SUBSIDIARY OF COMPANY RECOGNISED IN YEAR 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
